concept.title: Install instantclient and ODBC for use with Microsoft Access
concept.shortdesc: Oracle ODBC drivers enable an application (in this instance Microsofot Access) to access data on the oracle database via the ODBC connection. Downloading and installing the ODBC drivers requires following the Oracle install instructions percisely. This is a tool that the Stats user require for a legacy application.

conbody.p: The first step is install the Oracle drivers as an administrator following the correc folder structure.
Once installed, the ODBC interface can be configured.
Have the end user test the connections on their profile.
